details.1: I'm A Front End Developer Living In Mashhad
details.2: If you need someone who can implement the front part of the site and also has a team spirit, creativity and responsibility, contact me

aboutMe.2: Hello, I am Masoud Motaharinia,I was born in 1380, I live in Mashhad. I have been learning Front-End for about a year, and I am currently looking for a job position in this field. You can see my projects and their detailed information in the projects section. Also, to communicate with me, you can refer to the contact me section at home.
